item.title: Help Your Kids With Maths
item.description:
《Help Your Kids With Maths》，by Carol Voderman

1. Numbers

  • 各种数字符号：现代印度-阿拉伯数字，玛雅数字，中文数字，罗马数字，埃及数字，巴比伦数字

  • addition, subtraction, multiplication, division: 加减乘除
